description.value: You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd. You no longer need to have cover or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak]. If you would have lesser cover from a creature, you gain standard cover instead and can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover]; if you would have standard cover from a creature, you gain greater cover instead.
